original_text: When I rose in the morning to nurse my child, behold, he was dead. But when I looked at him closely in the morning, behold, he was not the child that I had borne.”
korean_text: 아침에 내가 내 아들을 젖 먹이려고 일어나 본즉 죽었기로 내가 아침에 자세히 보니 내가 낳은 아들이 아니더이다 하매

sentences.original_text: When I rose in the morning to nurse my child
sentences.korean_translation: 아침에 내 아이에게 젖을 먹이려고 일어났을 때

sentences.original_text: But when I looked at him closely in the morning
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 아침에 그를 자세히 살펴보았을 때

sentences.original_text: behold, he was not the child
